Create your character by choosing a base class, and then allowing 5 points in the stats of your choice. The game is about exploring a dungeon and fighting monsters. The combat system works with an action status bar. The higher your dexterity is, the quicker it will fill. When filled up, you can perform an action : either you attack, or you prepare your defenses for the incoming attack. You\'ll know when a monster is about to hit you because there will be three red exclamation mark. You can attack by clicking on a monster, or block by clicking on the block button.
